layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (50,50) size 700x154
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (50,50) size 700x154 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF] [border: (1px solid #000000)]
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (51,51) size 598x52 [color=#000080] [border: (1px solid #000080)]
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (1,17) size 596x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 352x17
          text run at (0,0) width 352: "There should be a yellow square in the top-left corner, "
        LayoutInline {EM} at (0,0) size 39x17
          LayoutText {#text} at (351,0) size 39x17
            text run at (351,0) width 39: "inside"
        LayoutText {#text} at (389,0) size 111x17
          text run at (389,0) width 111: " the inner border."
